title: 'Perfect Family Game!!!'
body: 'If you are intrigued about your cousins colleagues or friends or if you are looking forward to know them a little better then this is the game for youâ€¦ The game motivates you to express your strong desires fears happy/sad memories and also helps you to introspect.. Beware some hidden secrets might also come out if you play honestly'

title: 'Gets interesting conversations going!'
body: This is such a lovely game. The rules for playing and winning are simple and clear. The fact that some cards expect us to remember someone else's answer makes it important for people to listen to each other. Some questions are fun and superficial while some others are deep and can really lead to some deep conversations. I'm updating this review of mine since I have bought this game two more times now! I have gotten to know things about my children that I didn't before. One of the questions - what is the one thing you would like to change about your house made me think and think... about how much I love the home we have created. My 9 yo son had to talk for 30 seconds non stop describing another player and he chose his 21 yo sister! It was lovely to hear all the wonderful things he said about her! Seriously a must have game for any home! Thank you for the great game!

title: 'Family time!'
body: 'Good game for all age groups perfect for well spent family time'

title: 'Good for kids & family'
body: 'Interesting game to play with family and friends. Recommended.'

title: 'Needs like minded people'
body: The card game is good and there's no doubt about that. But in order to enjoy this with playmates, you definitely need some like minded and fun people who are willing to take the challanges. Otherwise, even if one player gets sulky, it's no good.

title: 'Lovely'
body: This is a lovely game to play with your family and friends. The only problem I feel it with the quality of the card otherwise it is fantabulous. I would recommend to be very light with the way you touch the cards otherwise they may bend bend. Given the quality I don't think I can complain because it was worth the daily as per the monetary deal. I would highly recommend this game to every single person.

title: 'Great game to trip down the memory lane'
body: 'We had a great time playing. We have spent quality time together knowing more about each other and had nostalgic experience talking about events from childhood. Tip to make it more effective turn the mobiles into silent mode and keep them away.'

title: 'Exciting game'
body: Yes I liked the game.It helps to reconnect to your family members and also know yourself better. Alot of times people don't know themselves. It helps you to know your hidden self

title: 'What the world needed! Meaningful connection'
body: 'The game is absolutely fantastic and godsend for children right now... stuck in online school itâ€™s been hard for all of us to deal with social and physical isolation with this is a game the young ones are finding new ways to connect at a deep and real level with friends and even within the family. This is a game that makes me bring out the innocent kid in me! Super recommend & need more of such human connection moments and opportunities in our lives!'

title: 'Great value for money game'
body: 'Wonderful way to engage kids and make the family bond together. It is well priced excellent quality and makes a great gift!'

title: 'A must try.'
body: 'Fun & intelligent. Rules are easy to follow. Like most of skillsmatics games this one too is perfect for some family fun as well as play dates picnics sundays late evening entertainment etc. An all time favourite for my family. A must try.'

title: 'Super fun game from Skillmatics'
body: 'Great way to spend quality time with your family by learning about each other and have lots of fun!'

title: 'Loved it!'
body: 'Super fun game. Loved the video instructions! Played it with a friend and really felt that it promoted open and fun conversation. Going to be playing a lot more with different people :)'

title: 'Extremely engaging and exciting game - would recommend everyone to buy ! :)'
body: 'Super super fun game!! gets everyone talking beyond just general conversations. can lead to many funny insights and bonding time. Had an amazing time playing with both family and friends. Allows everyone to learn about each other in a fun and exciting way - something extremely important in any relationship. the cards are all designed and made extremely well and the questions extremely thought-provoking and interesting. All the other action cards and detailings as well are incredible taking the game to the next level. very innovative thinking to make it interactive and engaging. Overall the game is really good. works as an amazing gift for family and friends as well - will definitely buy more of this game for birthdays Highly highly recommend everyone to go buy it! :)'

title: 'Interesting conversation game'
body: 'Very interesting... Love the different sections. My daughter and I enjoy playing this conversation game.'

title: 'Very interactive and highly recomended to all age groups'
body: 'Train of thought is a really interesting and fun game to play with friends and family a must buy. Moreover the instructions and rules of the games are very straightforward and easy to understand.'

body: 'We love this game. I like to take the cards in the car and ask them while I am driving. They love it and it makes our drive go by much faster. They are 8 and 6 and they love this game. The questions really make them think outside the box and I love that. Critical thinkers will love this game!!'

title: 'N/A'
body: 'I bought this game for our whole family to play as we have some children with social and communication difficulties. We all really enjoy it. It is simple to play and makes people think and connect whilst still having something of a competitive element. Some of the questions can be a struggle to answer...even for adults...but it really opens up the floor. My daughter says she loves playing it because it makes her talk about interesting things!'
